Tanks

类 Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Chara
      • Tanks.Tree

  • public class Tree
extends Chara
    Represents a tree character in the game.

        public static java.util.Random random

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Tree

        public Tree(int xCor,
            int yCor,
            java.lang.Character chara,
            processing.core.PImage treeImage)
        Constructs a Tree object with the specified coordinates, character, and tree image.
        参数:
        xCor - The x-coordinate of the tree.
        yCor - The y-coordinate of the tree.
        chara - The character associated with the tree.
        treeImage - The image representing the tree.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addTreeRange

        public void addTreeRange(TerrainPixelLine tpl)
        Adds a terrain pixel line to the tree's range.
        参数:
        tpl - The terrain pixel line to add.

      • setRandomPosition

        public void setRandomPosition()
        Sets a random position for the tree based on the available terrain pixel lines.

      • getTreeImage

        public processing.core.PImage getTreeImage()
        Gets the image representing the tree.
        返回:
        The tree image.
